channel.title: 🏢 Polixir.ai on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Polixir.ai on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Provably and Practically Efficient Adversarial Imitation Learning with General Function Approximation
item.description: OPT-AIL: Provably efficient adversarial imitation learning with general function approximation, achieving polynomial sample and interaction complexity, outperforming existing deep AIL methods.
